message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $880,000?
